title: City highways
brief_description: An example of how heavily populated areas and shifts of population affect the lives of people. Promotes an understanding and appreciation of civic projects. Shows the planning, construction and use of controlled-access highways through metropolitan centres.
description: An example of how heavily populated areas and shifts of population affect the lives of people. Promotes an understanding and appreciation of civic projects. Shows the planning, construction and use of controlled-access highways through metropolitan centres.
